elements.label: Church of the Bright Edge

slots.label: Associate
slots.description: A new recruit, or a hardened disciple.

slots.label: Ceremony
slots.description: To recruit a novice, I only need a small secret. The higher mysteries require deeper oaths.

slots.label: Trappings
slots.description: For a proper sense of occasion. Consumes Ingredients and Influences; uses, but does not consume, Tools.

elements.description: An occult society dedicated to the Hours of struggle and conquest. [You can use Cults with the Talk verb to recruit or promote followers, and to send them out on errands to gather resources. A Believer can be promoted to a Disciple; a few gifted Disciples can be exalted even higher, to Assassins.]
